The 'Action Roguelike' tag on Steam is used to identify games that blend the fast-paced action gameplay of traditional titles with the procedural generation and permadeath mechanics typically found in roguelikes. These games often feature intense combat, character progression through loot collection, and randomly generated levels or enemies. Players must adapt and strategize to overcome each new challenge, as death can mean starting over from the beginning with only the experience gained. Action Roguelikes offer a unique blend of excitement and challenge that keeps players engaged for hours on end.
